Description: Hitman: Absolution tells the story of the personal contract assassin. Betrayed by the Agency and hunted by the police, Agent 47 seeks redemption in a corrupt and mutilated world

Features:

The newest technology Glacier 2 â„¢: Hitman: Absolution, built on it from the ground, offers a cinematic story, unique visuals and a unique game and sound design.
Treatment of contracts
: Create your own masterpieces, choosing the level, purpose and conditions of the murder weapon in a completely new mode of online play. Create a contract you can share with friends or the entire community of Hitman, and the money for their execution or creation will allow to open new weapons, amplifiers and camouflage.
freedom of choice
: Stalk your prey, break with the battle or mask as long as possible. In the role of Agent 47 the choice is yours, thanks to the expanded game mechanics and incredible artificial intelligence system.
Feel the living world
: The Hitman: Absolution every moment can turn into a story with unique characters, rich dialogue and Hollywood swing events, giving nothing on similar gaming experience.
Concealer
: Agent 47 is available almost any disguise human encounters on his way. Immobilize the victim, stolen her clothes and use your instincts to mingle with the enemy and confuse his plans.
Mode instincts: Look at the world through the eyes of Agent 47 and become the most dangerous killer in the world. With instincts mode you will be able to anticipate the movement of the enemy will discover new ways of killing and begin to use weapons with deadly accuracy.
